name: Cyb3rman UN0: Hacked Special Edition 2077
description:
NOTE: WEB PLAYER MAY NOT WORK!!!

You control a cyber agent but the enemies have hacked your control and your control pad is not working correctly, you're out of CONTROL

Made for:  GMTK 2020 Summer GameJam

Theme: Out of Control

Sadly we didn't have time to submit the game.

By: Frans, Isak, Gustav, Hanna, Carl.
